summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of WhatsApp2 clone. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly including login, real-time chat, message sending, search, and user management.
passed_tests: ✅ Backend API /api/health returns status ok
✅ Backend API /api/auth/login works with Saswata credentials
✅ Backend API /api/conversations returns 10 conversations list
✅ Backend API /api/messages/{conversation_id} returns messages
✅ Backend API /api/messages POST sends new messages successfully
✅ Backend API /api/messages/read marks messages as read
✅ Backend API /api/auth/register creates new users
✅ Login page loads with email/password form and quick login options
✅ Quick login with pre-seeded user 'Saswata' works
✅ Main sidebar shows contacts with last message previews and unread badges (9 unread)
✅ Clicking contact loads chat messages in right panel
✅ Chat panel shows message bubbles (sent=green, received=white) with timestamps
✅ Double-tick read receipts visible on sent messages
✅ Message input area with emoji, attachment, and mic icons present
✅ Typing message and pressing Enter sends it successfully
✅ New chat button opens new chat panel with user list
✅ Search functionality in sidebar filters contacts
✅ New chat search functionality works
✅ Logout via menu dropdown works
✅ Register tab in login form works and creates new users successfully
